title: 3PM
content:
Health Updates: teens lack Vitamin D; how to live to be 100; EFA vs PMS; antioxidants; antibiotic overuse by seniors =... <!--more--> hypo-tension, stroke, death; Vitamin D vs breast cancer; almonds aid fat metabolism; fructose devastates metabolism.

Commentary: economy & society JB Handley, along with this wife, founded Generation Rescue in 2005.
Today, Jenny McCarthy serves as President & national spokesperson of Generation Rescue.
The nonprofit, all-volunteer organization is dedicated to sharing information with parents to help them recover their children from autism.
www.GenerationRescue.
